parameters.name: bShowConfigDialogAtStartup
parameters.description: Whether to show the configuration dialog at startup.

parameters.name: nMonitorNum
parameters.description: Show monitor of dimension board in slot. Valid if MONITOR_TYPE_DIMENSION is selected.

parameters.name: bFullScreen
parameters.description: Whether to run in fullscreen mode.

parameters.name: bShowStatusbar
parameters.description: Whether to show the status bar.

parameters.name: bShowTitlebar
parameters.description: Whether to show the title bar.

parameters.name: bShowDriveLed
parameters.description: Whether to show drive LED (always FALSE for Previous).

parameters.name: bSwapCmdAlt
parameters.description: Whether to swap Cmd and Alt keys.

parameters.name: szMappingFileName
parameters.description: Path to custom key mapping file. This is only relevant if nKeymapType is set to KEYMAP_LOADED.

parameters.name: kMouseMode
parameters.description: Key for mouse mode toggle (without modifiers).

parameters.name: kStatusbar
parameters.description: Key for status bar toggle (without modifiers).

parameters.name: kTitlebar
parameters.description: Key for title bar toggle (without modifiers).

parameters.name: bEnableMapToKey
parameters.description: Whether to map mouse to keys.

parameters.name: fLinSpeedNormal
parameters.description: Linear mouse speed in normal mode.

parameters.name: fLinSpeedLocked
parameters.description: Linear mouse speed in locked mode.

parameters.name: fExpSpeedNormal
parameters.description: Exponential mouse speed in normal mode.

parameters.name: fExpSpeedLocked
parameters.description: Exponential mouse speed in locked mode.

parameters.name: nMemoryBankSize0
parameters.description: Size of memory bank 0 in MB.

parameters.name: nMemoryBankSize1
parameters.description: Size of memory bank 1 in MB.

parameters.name: nMemoryBankSize2
parameters.description: Size of memory bank 2 in MB.

parameters.name: nMemoryBankSize3
parameters.description: Size of memory bank 3 in MB.

parameters.name: nRomCustomMac0
parameters.description: first byte of custom MAC address

parameters.name: nRomCustomMac1
parameters.description: second byte of custom MAC address

parameters.name: bRealtime
parameters.description: TRUE if realtime sources shoud be used

parameters.name: nDSPType
parameters.description: Describes how the DSP should be "emulated".

parameters.name: bDSPMemoryExpansion
parameters.description: Determines whether DSP memory expansion is available or not.

parameters.name: bCompatibleFPU
parameters.description: Determines whether a more compatible FPU should be used or not.

parameters.name: bMMU
parameters.description: Determines whether MMU is enabled or not.

parameters.name: bI860Thread
parameters.description: Whether to use thread for I860.

parameters.name: nMemoryBankSize00
parameters.description: Memory bank size 0 for board 0 in MB.

parameters.name: nMemoryBankSize01
parameters.description: Memory bank size 1 for board 0 in MB.

parameters.name: nMemoryBankSize02
parameters.description: Memory bank size 2 for board 0 in MB.

parameters.name: nMemoryBankSize03
parameters.description: Memory bank size 3 for board 0 in MB.

parameters.name: szRomFileName0
parameters.description: Path to ROM file for board 0.

parameters.name: nMemoryBankSize10
parameters.description: Memory bank size 0 for board 1 in MB.

parameters.name: nMemoryBankSize11
parameters.description: Memory bank size 1 for board 1 in MB.

parameters.name: nMemoryBankSize12
parameters.description: Memory bank size 2 for board 1 in MB.

parameters.name: nMemoryBankSize13
parameters.description: Memory bank size 3 for board 1 in MB.

parameters.name: szRomFileName1
parameters.description: Path to ROM file for board 1.

parameters.name: nMemoryBankSize20
parameters.description: Memory bank size 0 for board 2 in MB.

parameters.name: nMemoryBankSize21
parameters.description: Memory bank size 1 for board 2 in MB.

parameters.name: nMemoryBankSize22
parameters.description: Memory bank size 2 for board 2 in MB.

parameters.name: nMemoryBankSize23
parameters.description: Memory bank size 3 for board 2 in MB.

parameters.name: szRomFileName2
parameters.description: Path to ROM file for board 2.
